items.title: AI-Powered Product Recommendation Engine
items.description: Implement an AI-driven system that suggests relevant products to users based on their browsing and purchase history.
acceptance_criteria: System displays at least 5 relevant product recommendations on the homepage and product detail pages.
Recommendations update dynamically based on user interactions within the same session.
Recommendation accuracy achieves at least 70% click-through rate in A/B testing compared to baseline.
System supports personalization for both logged-in and guest users.
non_functional: Recommendations must load within 500ms after page load.
System must handle up to 10,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.
Recommendation model retraining should occur at least once every 24 hours.

notes: User input was high-level; assumed requirement is for a personalized recommendation feature integrated into an e-commerce platform. Specifics such as algorithms, data privacy, and integration with existing systems need further clarification.
